json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="dbServers">
<prop type="array" name="fileSystemConfigurationDetails">
<prop type="array" name="dbPlans">
<prop type="array" name="nsgCidrs">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="scanIpIds">
<prop type="array" name="sshPublicKeys" required="True">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="vipIds">

command.name: delete
command.confirmation: Are you sure you want to perform this operation?

command.name: create
command.argGroup:
<arg type="array" var="$resource.properties.dbServers" options="db-servers" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$resource.properties.nsgCidrs" options="nsg-cidrs" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$resource.properties.sshPublicKeys" options="ssh-public-keys" group="Properties">

help.short: The geo-location where the resource lives

json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="dbServers" arg="$resource.properties.dbServers">
<prop type="array" name="nsgCidrs" arg="$resource.properties.nsgCidrs">
<prop type="array" name="sshPublicKeys" arg="$resource.properties.sshPublicKeys" required="True">

<prop type="array" name="sshPublicKeys" required="True">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="vipIds">

command.name: update
command.argGroup:
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$resource.properties.computeNodes" options="compute-nodes" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$resource.properties.fileSystemConfigurationDetails" options="file-system-configuration-details" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$resource.properties.sshPublicKeys" options="ssh-public-keys" group="Properties">
